                            boolean includeUsers,
                            boolean includeCategory,
                            boolean includeCopyright)
                     throws DaoException
Parameters:
resourceId - Resource identifier
includeUsers - Flag to indicate if we need to initialize users
includeCategory - Flag to indicate if we need to initialize category
includeCopyright - Flag to indicate if we need to initialize copyright
Returns:
Resource from DB
Throws:
DaoException

getResources

public java.util.List<Resource> getResources(long userId,
                                             long categoryId,
                                             java.lang.String mimeType,
                                             long copyrightId,
                                             boolean sortedByName,
                                             boolean includeUsers,
                                             boolean includeCategory,
                                             boolean includeCopyright)
                                      throws DaoException
Parameters:
userId - User identifier
categoryId - Filtering category identifier or 0 to get resources from all categories
mimeType - Filtering MIME type or empty string to get resources with all MIME types
copyrightId - Filtering copyright identifier or 0 to get resources with all copyrights
sortedByName - Flag to indicate if we want the results sorted by category name
includeUsers - Flag to indicate if we need to initialize users
includeCategory - Flag to indicate if we need to initialize category
includeCopyright - Flag to indicate if we need to initialize copyright
Returns:
List of resources that can be filtered by user and MIME type and sorted by name
Throws:
DaoException

getResources

public java.util.List<Resource> getResources(long userId,
                                             java.util.List<java.lang.Long> categoriesIds,
                                             java.lang.String mimeType,
                                             long copyrightId,
                                             boolean sortedByName,
                                             boolean includeUsers,
                                             boolean includeCategory,
                                             boolean includeCopyright)
                                      throws DaoException
Parameters:
userId - User identifier
categoriesIds - Filtering categories identifiers or null to get resources of all categories
mimeType - Filtering MIME type or empty string to get resources with all MIME types
copyrightId - Filtering copyright identifier or 0 to get resources with all copyrights
sortedByName - Flag to indicate if we want the results sorted by category name
includeUsers - Flag to indicate if we need to initialize users
includeCategory - Flag to indicate if we need to initialize category
includeCopyright - Flag to indicate if we need to initialize copyright
Returns:
List of resources that can be filtered by user and MIME type and sorted by name
Throws:
DaoException
